usage: A data frame with 48 observations on the following 5 variables.
reference:
This is a balanced, one-way MANOVA design, with n=8 trees for each
rootstock.
description:
Description
In a classic experiment carried out from 1918 to 1934, growth of apple trees
of six different rootstocks were compared on four measures of size.
How do the measures of size vary with the type of rootstock?
title: Growth of Apple Trees from Different Root Stocks

parameters.girth4: a numeric vector: trunk girth at 4 years (mm x 100)
parameters.weight15: a numeric vector: weight of tree above ground at 15 years (lb x 1000)
parameters.ext4: a numeric vector: extension growth at 4 years (m)
parameters.girth15: a numeric vector: trunk girth at 15 years (mm x 100)
